scripts.test: npm run test-battle && npm run test-battle-off-season && npm run test-battle-s1 && npm run test-prompt-monsters && npm run test-stamina && npm run test-integration
scripts.deploy-all: npm run deploy --network=$npm_config_network --name=battle && npm run deploy --network=$npm_config_network --name=battle-off-season && npm run deploy --network=$npm_config_network --name=battle-s1 && npm run deploy --network=$npm_config_network --name=prompt-monsters && npm run deploy --network=$npm_config_network --name=stamina
scripts.post-deploy-all: npm run post-deploy --network=$npm_config_network --name=battle && npm run post-deploy --network=$npm_config_network --name=battle-off-season && npm run post-deploy --network=$npm_config_network --name=battle-s1 && npm run post-deploy --network=$npm_config_network --name=stamina
scripts.preupgrade: npm run clean && npm run test-$npm_config_name
scripts.update: npx -p npm-check-updates  -c 'ncu' && npx -p npm-check-updates  -c 'ncu -u' && npm i
